protein.general_function: Involved in protein serine/threonine kinase activity
protein.specific_function: Serine/threonine kinase that may play a role in mediating the growth-factor and stress induced activation of the transcription factor CREB

reference.reference_text: Bjorbaek C, Vik TA, Echwald SM, Yang PY, Vestergaard H, Wang JP, Webb GC, Richmond K, Hansen T, Erikson RL, et al.: Cloning of a human insulin-stimulated protein kinase (ISPK-1) gene and analysis of coding regions and mRNA levels of the ISPK-1 and the protein phosphatase-1 genes in muscle from NIDDM patients. Diabetes. 1995 Jan;44(1):90-7.
